Hello, we are Nayanika, Paulo and Shang, and this is the website of our Macroeconomics 2 presentation, dedicated to the review of the paper Gabaix, Xavier. 2020. "A Behavioral New Keynesian Model." American Economic Review, 110 (8): 2271-2327.
